description: I’m the art editor at The Times. Here are five things I've been watching, reading and listening to.
title: What’s in Our Queue? Young Fathers and More
title_page: What’s in Our Queue? Young Fathers and More - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s in Our Queue? Young Fathers and More Barbara Graustark In Manhattan, feeling venturesome ��
The Scottish trio Young Fathers. Julia Noni
I’m the art editor at The Times.
I spend most of my day working with reporters and critics. But in my off hours, there’s a lot that I watch, read and listen to for my own pleasure.
Here are five recent favorites →
